MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the LL55 postcode area of Caernarfon  affecting properties in Clwt Y Bont surrounding area. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 6:42am. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 7:24am on 23rd April 2021
